title: How to Make Your Crush Regret Rejecting You

steps.title: Wear your coolest outfits and style yourself before you go out.
steps.content: Wear your coolest outfits and style yourself before you go out. Try to put your best foot forward any time you’re around your crush. Looking your best will help you feel amazing, and your confidence will shine from within. At the same time, your crush will see how hot you are if other people see you as attractive. [1] X Research source You might give yourself a “glow up” makeover. Change your hairstyle and get a new outfit. If you wear makeup, watch a few tutorials and debut a new look at school.

steps.title: Being social makes you seem like a fun, happy person.
steps.content: Being social makes you seem like a fun, happy person. Plus, your friends can provide you with much-needed support and encouragement right now. [2] X Research source Not only that, but hanging with your crush’s friends shows them how cool and fun you are. Friends and family also help you feel better after being rejected. You’re well-loved, and they can show you that. [3] X Research source

steps.title: Pursuing someone new shows your crush you’re over them.
steps.content: Pursuing someone new shows your crush you’re over them. There’s probably someone amazing at school who’s caught your eye. Why not see if they’d be a good match? Look for a crush who shares the same interests as you and seems like someone who’d be interested dating. [4] X Research source You deserve to be happy. Meeting new people will also help you move on faster. [5] X Research source You can touch, smile, or flirt in general to make the first move. [6] X Expert Source Michele Fields Matchmaker & Dating Coach Expert Interview. 17 August 2021.

steps.title: Act confident so your crush recognizes how amazing you are.
steps.content: Act confident so your crush recognizes how amazing you are. Having confidence makes people perceive you as a more interesting, well-rounded person. [7] X Research source When you see your crush, stand tall so you look self-assured. When you pass them in the hallways at school, make eye contact with them and smile or say “hi” as you walk away. They’ll see that you’re a strong, confident person and may wonder if they made a mistake. To boost your confidence, list your best qualities to remind yourself why you’re amazing. [8] X Research source

steps.title: Make your crush think you’re happier without them.
steps.content: Make your crush think you’re happier without them. Participate in hobbies and activities that make you feel great. [9] X Research source Then, post on social media about the fun you’re having and talk about it at school. Your crush will see that you’re a fun, interesting person who’s living your best life. This is the perfect time to try new things. For instance, you might join a new club at school or start learning an instrument.

steps.title: Staying friends will help them see what they're missing.
steps.content: Staying friends will help them see what they're missing. Continue to talk to your crush at school or when you run into each other. [10] X Expert Source Michele Fields Matchmaker & Dating Coach Expert Interview. 17 August 2021. You don't want them to still think you're into them, so let them take the lead when it comes to texting or messaging. Hopefully, they'll realize they missed out on a great catch.

steps.title: Chasing your crush will only make them pull away more.
steps.content: Chasing your crush will only make them pull away more. It's hard to give up on someone you like, but it'll make you feel so much better in the long run. Be strong and distance yourself a little so you can hopefully turn the tables.Stop texting them. [11] X Expert Source Michele Fields Matchmaker & Dating Coach Expert Interview. 17 August 2021. For now, just hang out with your crush in groups rather than one-on-one. [12] X Research source Ask your friends to act as buffers until you feel more comfortable being alone with your crush. If you have classes with your crush, it's okay to talk to them when you see them.

steps.title: Your crush doesn’t need to know that you’re feeling hurt.
steps.content: Your crush doesn’t need to know that you’re feeling hurt. It’s normal to be sad when your crush rejects you, and you’ll feel better soon. [13] X Research source In the meantime, act like you’re totally unaffected by what happened. It was barely even a crush. If your crush tries to bring up what happened, just brush it off. Say, “Oh, I’ve already forgotten about that,” or “It’s really not a big deal.”

steps.title: Jealousy makes people crave your attention.
steps.content: Jealousy makes people crave your attention. It could even make your crush want to impress you. [14] X Trustworthy Source PubMed Central Journal archive from the U.S. National Institutes of Health Go to source When you're around your crush, Gush about how wonderful your new crush is. Hopefully, they'll feel bad about losing you. Say things like, “He’s the cutest guy I’ve ever met,” or “She’s the funniest girl ever.”

steps.title: Do your best to let them go, even if it’s hard.
steps.content: Do your best to let them go, even if it’s hard. You’ve probably fantasized about how amazing your relationship could be with your crush. We all do it, but usually our imagination is much better than reality. Releasing your fantasy of them may help you move on to someone better. [15] X Research source In some cases, moving on can make your crush wonder if they made a mistake. Maybe they'll start crushing on you!
